org.apache.poi.hssf.extractor
Class ExcelExtractor

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.POITextExtractor
      org.apache.poi.POIOLE2TextExtractor
          org.apache.poi.hssf.extractor.ExcelExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, ExcelExtractor
public class ExcelExtractor
extends POIOLE2TextExtractor
implements ExcelExtractor

A text extractor for Excel files.

Returns the textual content of the file, suitable for indexing by something like Lucene, but not really intended for display to the user.

To turn an excel file into a CSV or similar, then see the XLS2CSVmra example

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/poi/trunk/src/examples/src/org/apache/poi/hssf/eventusermodel/examples/XLS2CSVmra.java
